name: Hunted Gods
description:
Each door leads to a different time, place or dimension. And if the player look a freezer for a long time, for example, then the player will teleport to icy mountains. A potted plant teleport the player to a forest etc..Each dimension reflects the player’s personality test that changes the story and characters. You can use surreal items, like flying with an umbrella, or go back in time with a remote control. The goal is to reach the top of interdimensional stairs and find out what's up there on top of the whole cosmos.

New technique for HQ graphics, plays well with non-gaming PC!

Gravity-defying staircase, portals, surrealism, M. C. Escher, dinosaurs, zombies, robots, philosophy. dragons, unity asset store, doors of perception, third and first person, action, adventure, puzzles...`and a brain in a vat. Third and first person views, shooter, adventure, puzzle, melee and RPG elements.
